1.1.name: wordpress/eewee-popup
1.1.description:
Opening a popup ad when loading a page. Popup is little systematically load when opening the dough host site, or appear only at the first visit. You can choose to bring up a visual and / or text, and choose the color & width of the border of the popup.

PS: question, eewee.fr.
